SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class DrawingField

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.DrawingField
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DrawingField extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the drawing field in the game. It contains two types of decks: gold card deck and resource card deck. It also maintains the discovered gold cards and discovered resource cards. The drawing field is responsible for drawing cards from the decks and managing the discovered cards.
See Also:
